name: .LXSOPT File Extension
type_name: Liquid XML Studio Project Options File
summary: Learn about .LXSOPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Liquid XML Studio, an XML development environment; saved using XML formatting and contains complementary data for an .LXSPROJ project, such as the list of files that were open the last time the project was opened.

content: LXSOPT files are used by the software for remembering working state information for an XML development project.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
